name: Trick or Treat!
description:
This is just a small game I challenged myself to make in a short amount of time before this year's Halloween. I'm a budding game developer who's trying to get better and better and I wanted to see what I could do in a week. It could still use some work but I think it came out okay in terms of my skillset and the time I had :) Other than the music, everything is made by me! 

Controls:

Space - Open/Shut Door
Left Click - Give Out/Pick Up Candy
"A" or "D" - Dodge Poop
Escape - Quit Game
 
Sound effects: My daughter

Music: [Nightmare] by Alexander Nakarada (www.serpentsoundstudios.com)
